thread.section_title: Express Medical Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Express Medical Supply | www.exmed.net | 4 of 226
thread.title: Debbie Davis
thread.title_full: Express Medical Supply reviewed by Debbie Davis

author: Debbie Davis
title: Debbie Davis
text: I was very fortunate to learn of this website from my asthma physician. My nebulizer was very old and I needed to replace it. I replaced the nebulizer for under $100.00 for home use, I also found a smaller nebulizer for under $50.00. Both work exceptionally well. I have given the website to several other people. I suggest people visit the website and see for themselves, you can save a lot of money.
